name: radarec
description: RadaRec is a self-hosted recording manager for Radarr/Sonarr media downloads. It logs requests, tracks history, and manages recordings through a centralized interface.

features.title: Request Logging
features.description: Track all movie and show requests sent to Radarr and Sonarr with timestamps and status

features.title: Media Library
features.description: View complete history of media acquisitions including quality, size, and source

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor multiple Radarr and Sonarr instances from a single interface

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Record what users searched for and whether content was found or requested

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Analyze download patterns, popular requests, and system performance over time

features.title: User Management
features.description: Track which users requested specific content for accountability and usage insights

features.title: Failed Download Alerts
features.description: Get notified when downloads fail or require manual intervention
